articles.title: The latest Instax printer is a pricey but worthy upgrade - The Verge
articles.description: Fujifilm’s most expensive Instax Mini Link+ printer improves contrast, color, and detail but doesn’t seem to enhance text-heavy illustrations as claimed.

articles.title: PSA: OpenAI will remove several models from ChatGPT next month - 9to5Mac
articles.description: From time to time, OpenAI removes older models from ChatGPT’s model picker, as users become accustomed to newer ones. Here are the details.
